text: Do you have any advice for the date? I’d really like to be perfect this time.
What do you mean just be myself? Surely not, It’s all about the other person, isn’t it, being perfect for them.
I really hope the date goes well this time. I am determined to make it work. whatever this guy wants, I’m ready!
Come to think of it, this guy mentioned he likes really clean-shaven dudes. Make sure you get all of my hair.
